title: West Town Bakery and Diner
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Old school diner and bakery with a glass-walled kitchen where you could watch the kitchen. Has street-side cake building station. Diner hours 7am-3pm; bakery hours Sun-Thur 7am-9pm, Fri-Sat 7am-10pm. On the menu are vegan choices in sandwich, pancakes, waffles, granola; also could modify a few of the vegetarian items to vegan. Makes some vegan bakery goods. Prior to Aug 2012 was Bleeding Heart Bakery and Cafe (different ownership).
